title: Bloomberg's Rana on Microsoft Boosted By Cloud Revenue (Audio)
itunes:title: Bloomberg's Rana on Microsoft Boosted By Cloud Revenue (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. Guest: Anurag Rana, Bloomberg Intelligence's Senior Software and IT Analyst, on Microsoft exceeding earnings estimates, boosted by cloud revenues.
